amendment.description: To provide emergency funding for food aid to HIV/AIDS affected populations in sub-Saharan Africa.

action.text: Amendment SA 678 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 678 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 178.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 678.
Amendment SA 678 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S6449-6450; text: CR S6449) To provide emergency funding for food aid to HIV/AIDS affected populations in sub-Saharan Africa.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 678 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 178.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 678 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
